title: Zucker and Zimt
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe located by the market square in Eisenach. Mainly organic and locally sourced ingredients. Around two-thirds of the menu is vegetarian. Various vegan options that are clearly marked as such. Drinks can be prepared with soya milk. Has soya smoothies and other fresh juices. Nice atmosphere.
